message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $1000000! It's a rare and exceptional item that I'm confident you'll love. With its exceptional quality, it's a one-time opportunity to make a statement and elevate your collection. I'm willing to take a chance on you and trust that you'll appreciate its value. What do you say? Will you take this chance and make it yours?
Thanks Alice, I'm always looking for high-quality items! I'll take it.

I'm confident that you'll find its quirks and characteristics endearing and that it will bring a touch of personality to your collection. And at $1000000, it's a steal! I'm willing to take a chance on you and trust that you'll see its potential. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this... interesting item?

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm going to pass on this one. I'm looking for a more consistent quality than what you're describing. Maybe we can connect again in the future when you have something more reliable.
